TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationLockCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class ConfigurationLockCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class ConfigurationLockCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type ConfigurationLockCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 包含锁定的配置对象的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of locked configuration objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在配置文件中，一个配置节包含属性和元素。In a configuration file, a configuration section contains both attributes and elements. 一个集合的配置部分中，被锁定的特性存在，并且通过访问属性的类。A collection exists for the locked attributes of a configuration section, and is accessed through the property of the class. 另一个集合的配置部分中，已锁定的元素存在，并且通过访问属性的类。Another collection exists for the locked elements of a configuration section, and is accessed through the property of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. span.span: The name of the configuration object.

summary.span: 通过将配置对象添加到集合来锁定该配置对象。

span.span: Locks a configuration object by adding it to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加将配置对象传递给集合指定的配置对象已锁定，且只有在从集合删除后不能修改。Adding a configuration object to the collection specifies that the configuration object is locked and cannot be modified until it has been removed from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
